projects.title: Easy Study App - Graduation Project, for facilitate the management of the educational process in universities

description.about:
The Application works as a system to facilitate the management of the educational process in universities, through the services it provides in terms of managing study courses and academic years to project management and references.
 The system is mainly two sections: 
 • The Dashboard: through it, the supervisor and the teacher can modify the educational system data according to the privileges they have.
 • The android application: for student service that includes: 
   To access study resources. 
   Access to advertisements that are posted on the system. 
   Access to projects and references within the college library. 
   Download any information attached from the above in the form of a PDF file.
description.tools:
• postman for check APIs requests and responses.
• vsCode for flutter code.
description.role:
• Design the user interface. 
• Create the mobile application for student service.

description.about:
• Tic Tac Toe Game contains two choices: 
  •One Player: contains two levels: 
    •Easy level: the user plays against the application. the app generates random places to play.
    •Hard level: the user plays against an AI algorithm where it is difficult for the user to win.
  •Two Players: two user playing aginst each other.
• run the app as website on chrome and apk on mobile.
• Fast response and suitable for all screen sizes.
description.tools:
• vsCode for flutter.
• I run the code on chrome and android mobile.
description.role:
• implement the AI algorithm code within the application.
• Design the user interface. 
• Create the mobile application.
